title: Foucault - “Power” ft. Chomsky
description:
An homage to Foucault, vampirism, eternity and, of course, turtlenecks.
#turtlenecklace #powerfoucault #🐢🧥💪🏻

Fancy a more subdued version without Chomsky? See https://youtube.com/shorts/2fu6isBhhIE

For a playlist with better thumbnails visit https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLosPjrka5lZqYznfXOsz7Ex5Dhl9jx1Ay

• CREDITS •

🎶 Song: Breakfast by Dove Cameron (https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=z4sMXibc_S0)

📚 Blue, Red, Orange & Yellow Foucault: covers of “The Essential Works of Foucault, 1954–1984,” volumes I–III. Published by The New Press in 1998, 1999 and 2001.

🧛🏻‍♂️ Foucault with claws: cover of “Power: The Essential Works of Michel Foucault, 1954–1984.” Published by Penguin in 2020.

👴🏼 Chomsky’s head: extracted from https://www.thefamouspeople.com/profiles/noam-chomsky-8262.php

🥄 The spoon: CRISTEL Panoply serving spoon – “brushed-finish stainless steel, often used together with the spatula: ideal partners for serving at table.” https://www.cristel.com/en/products/serving-spoon

📎 Thumbnail: SCRL, Memed.io

✨ With many thanks to Húrin Thalion for the original prompt and for the Chomsky angle!

NO COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT INTENDED.
